title: SET_RAGDOLL_BLOCKING_FLAGS
content:
0x26695EC767728D840x9C8F830D// SetRagdollBlockingFlags
void SET_RAGDOLL_BLOCKING_FLAGS(Ped ped, int flags);Works for both player and peds, but some flags don't seem to work for the player (1, for example)  
1 - Blocks ragdolling when shot.  
2 - Blocks ragdolling when hit by a vehicle. The ped still might play a falling animation.  
4 - Blocks ragdolling when set on fire.  
-----------------------------------------------------------------------  
There seem to be 26 flags  
Old name:  _SET_PED_RAGDOLL_BLOCKING_FLAGS
codeBlocks:
// SetRagdollBlockingFlags
void SET_RAGDOLL_BLOCKING_FLAGS(Ped ped, int flags);

Works for both player and peds, but some flags don't seem to work for the player (1, for example)  
1 - Blocks ragdolling when shot.  
2 - Blocks ragdolling when hit by a vehicle. The ped still might play a falling animation.  
4 - Blocks ragdolling when set on fire.  
-----------------------------------------------------------------------  
There seem to be 26 flags
